summary: THE HEAD LIGHTS DISPLAYED POOR VISIBILITY.  *JB  THERE APPEARED TO BE A FLAW IN THE DESIGN OF THE VEHICLE THAT PRESENTED A SAFETY HAZARD.  THE FRONT BUMPER WAS SO LOW THAT THERE WAS AN AREA OF COMPLETE DARKNESS ON THE ROAD BETWEEN THE TWO HEADLIGHTS WHEN DRIVEN AT NIGHT.  THE VEHICLE HAD BEEN TAKEN TO THE DEALER ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS AND THEY STATED IT WAS A DESIGN PROBLEM.   *SCC  *JB
